about_the_game:
In the middle of a dense forest, tucked away in the rocks, a dark and wet rock corridor leads to a stone slab adorned with meaningful hand-engraved drawings. Behind this stone slab lies a secret temple, hidden for centuries. The temple's buildings were built halfway into the rocks. They are connected by stone roads and bridges that rise from a maar. Between the network of roads and stairs, some trees have planted their roots, casting a cooling shade under them.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
detailed_description:

Behind this stone slab lies a secret temple, hidden for centuries. The temple's buildings were built halfway into the rocks. They are connected by stone roads and bridges that rise from a maar. Between the network of roads and stairs, some trees have planted their roots, casting a cooling shade under them.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
name: RPGScenery - Forest Temple

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 or Equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
